name: Energy
description:
In this audio visual interactive experience your head has caught fire, and if you want to keep it that way you are going to have to dodge the fire-killing spinning and bouncing knives of knife city !!

Thankfully you have the power of energy drinks on your side!!!! With them you can slow down time highly effectively, only problem is your tolerance increases with each you drink and soon you will be highly lethargic and things will seem insurmountable without them, and even with them eventually so watch out!!

don't press escape, and don't just drink like 60000 energy drinks, I forgot to make that kill you

This game is proudly brought to you by itch.io and the Australian Government.
